leftSection.title: Reserve Your Spot Today
highlights: Limited Seats Available – Secure your place in this transformative experience.
Pricing: Starting at INR 20,000/- (including all meals, accommodation, and sessions).
leftSection.callToAction: Take the First Step Towards a Balanced Life
leftSection.description: Don’t let stress define your life. Join us in Rishikesh this January and rediscover the joy of living. Your path to inner peace starts here.
